snippet: Under a deal, PAI Partners and the French food cooperative Lur Berri would hold equal stakes in Labeyrie, the producer of foie gras, smoked salmon and other gourmet foods.
abstract: Under a deal, PAI Partners and the French food cooperative Lur Berri would hold equal stakes in Labeyrie, the producer of foie gras, smoked salmon and other gourmet foods.

headline.main: PAI Partners Plans Joint Venture to Control Labeyrie Fine Foods
